titleInfo.title: Exterior of National Jewish Hospital at Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#19 National Jewish Hospital at Denver''.

mods.abstract: One of the buildings on the National Jewish Hospital at Denver's campus. The inscription on the architrave of the building reads, ''Joseph E. Shoenberg Memorial.''

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
